thread.title: Court sides with Uber drivers to expand case over pay
thread.title_full: Court sides with Uber drivers to expand case over pay

author: SUDHIN THANAWALA
title: Court sides with Uber drivers to expand case over pay
text:
Court sides with Uber drivers to expand case over pay   
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) â€” A federal judge granted class-action status Tuesday to a case in California against Uber over the payment of its drivers. 
The ruling increases the number of potential California plaintiffs in the lawsuit claiming Uber drivers are incorrectly classified as independent contractors when they are actually employees. kAm&]$] s:DEC:4E r@FCE yF586 t5H2C5 r96? :? $2? uC2?4:D4@ >256 9:D 564:D:@? :?
